title: Mern Chat App
description: This is a real-time chat application that has been built using the MERN stack and Sockets, which enables users to engage in seamless communication with one another. The application has been deployed on render.com's free tier, providing a cost-effective solution for users looking for a reliable chat service.

title: Expense Tracker
description: I have developed a comprehensive MERN stack application that enables the monitoring and tracking of earnings and expenses. The user interface is designed to be intuitive, with a dynamic dashboard that features visual graphs created using Chart.js. The application is styled using Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI, providing a professional and visually appealing experience.

title: Portfolio Website
description: I have developed a React application that exhibits my professional endeavors, academic pursuits, and personal interests. This application serves as a platform to showcase my skills, achievements, and experiences. It can be utilized as a tool to present my portfolio in a professional setting. I am pleased to inform you that this app has been successfully deployed on GitHub Pages

title: Old Portfolio Website
description: I have developed a React application that serves to showcase my professional projects, interests, and academic background. I am pleased to inform you that this app has been successfully deployed on GitHub Pages

title: Cricket Auction
description: Currently, I am working on a React app that simulates a franchise league auction. In this auction, ten teams can bid for a player, and the highest bidder will get the player. The goal of this simulation is to complete the squad within the budget.

title: Hangman
description: In this Python project, I developed the game of hangman with careful consideration of the established rules. The project outcome reflects a commitment to maintaining high standards of quality and adherence to best practices.

title: Blackjack Game
description: A Python project where I implemented the concept of the BlackJack card game. Currently, only one player can play against the computer, but I am working on making it a multiplayer game.

title: Higher Lower Game
description: Created Higher Lower game concept with two sections for users to compare if left section is higher or lower. Correct guesses continue the game, while incorrect ones end it.
